long_description: Featuring an eye-pleasing bamboo veneer, the Komperdell Carbon Bamboo ski poles offer lightweight performance on the slopes. Carbon-fiber construction offers featherweight performance, and bamboo reinforcements enhance durability and looks. The Komperdell Carbon Bamboo ski poles feature a leather grip and leather straps that offer a stylish look and a soft feel in the hand. Race basket is designed for packed snow, and tungsten carbide flex tip offers reliable purchase on hardpack.
short_description: Featuring an eye-pleasing bamboo veneer, the Komperdell Carbon Bamboo ski poles offer lightweight performance on the slopes.
